Package datastorage

Class ObjectToJsonb

java.lang.Object
datastorage.ObjectToJsonb
public class ObjectToJsonb
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the serializing process, where all the game information that need to be saved are converted into a JSON-B.
Author:
Isabel

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) java.lang.StringBuilder sb
    a StringBuilder that is used to write in all the information of the objects that need to be saved

  • Constructor Summary

    ObjectToJsonb()

    This method gets the information of the following params.
    void writeFile​(java.lang.StringBuilder sb)

  • Field Details

    • sb

      java.lang.StringBuilder sb
      a StringBuilder that is used to write in all the information of the objects that need to be saved

  • Constructor Details

    • ObjectToJsonb

      public ObjectToJsonb()

  • Method Details

    • toSerialize

      public void toSerialize​(GameValue gameValue, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Harvester harvester, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill, FieldTile fieldTile, Silo silo, LevelOfDifficulty levelOfDifficulty, CourtTrade courtTrade, MovingObject movingObject)
      This method gets the information of the following params. It puts the serialized JSON-B into a StringBuilder Object. This JSON-B is written into a textfile, that is located in "src/main/java/datastorage/information/farmersimulator.txt"
      Parameters:
      gameValue - saved information: cash, day
      farmer - saved information: position, is selected
      tractor - saved information: position, is selected, is attached, petrol tank capacity
      harvester - saved information: position, is selected, is attached, petrol tank capacity, grain tank capacity
      cultivator - saved information: position, is selected, is attached
      dumpTruck - saved information: position, is selected, is attached
      seedDrill - saved information: position, is selected, is attached
      fieldTile - saved information: fieldtile conditions, bought fields
      silo - saved information: capacity
      levelOfDifficulty - saved information: chosen level
      courtTrade - saved information: selling price
      movingObject - saved information: position, is selected

    • writeFile

      public void writeFile​(java.lang.StringBuilder sb)
      This method deals with writing the StringBuilder Object into a textfile, that is set write-protected. It checks if a textfile already exists or not. If there is already a textfile, the information will be overwritten.
      Parameters:
      sb - the StringBuilder with all the information to write into the text file
